text: a l laoh ban sanyea cheamuoy puok anak nouv chyophond cheachraen del puok anak nung rubausa vea ning aoy puok anak yk vea yeang chabrhsa bamphot . haey trong ban reareang puok anak pi dai mnoussa teanglay(knong kar veay tb champoh puok anak) ning daembi aoy vea klaycha phosdo tang samreab banda anak del mean chomnue ning daembi trong nung changaoulobangheanh puok anak nouv meakra del troemotrauv
